about.title: About Rrish
about.subtitle: Passionate Educator. Blues Improviser. Musical Guide.
content: Music has been my constant companion for over 15 years. What started as a personal journey into blues improvisation has evolved into a deep passion for helping others discover their own musical voice.

Based in Melbourne, I specialize in guitar improvisation with a focus on blues foundations. My approach combines technical skill development with creative expression, ensuring that every student not only learns to play but learns to communicate through music.
I believe that music is a language that everyone can speak. My role is not to dictate how you should sound, but to guide you toward finding your authentic musical expression.
